column4: um, i need some help with mplayer. i (think) i need it to play asx / asf files (like on www.mp3.com.au/thedry) but i installed via synaptic, and i 'open with' mplayer, but nothing happens... *help*
and when i try to open it from the "apps" menu, it does nothign too
is mplayer generally buggey? (i think i remember reading it somewhere in the forums) if so, is htere a better way to play asx/asf files?
did you check if a process is created if you "click" on mplayer?
see you a (g)mplayer process with top?
use "ps aux | grep mplayer" for process listening
ok, this means that there is no mplayer process
this is only the grep process
type "mplayer <filename>.asf" in your terminal, I am sure mplayer will tell you the problem
i typed in this: mplayer /home/matthew/PlayASX.ASP and it gave me the same feedback it did when i typed "mplayer" ina terminal
is .asp a media file? I think its a web dokument
have you tried to install mplayer from source
